definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Vellum preserves photographs on scrapbook pages.
sentences.chinese: 牛皮纸上保留了照片的剪贴簿页面。

sentences.english: I bought a dictionary and wrapped it up in brown paper.
sentences.chinese: 我买了本字典，并把它包在了牛皮纸里。

sentences.english: Unbleached sack kraft paper, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 未漂白袋用牛皮纸，未涂布，卷筒或平版。

sentences.english: In 3-ply kraft paper of about 40kg net each.
sentences.chinese: 三层牛皮纸袋，每袋净重约40公斤。

sentences.english: Other sack kraft paper, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 其它袋用牛皮纸，未涂布，卷筒或平版。

sentences.english: The piece goods are to be wrapped in Kraft paper, then packed in wooden cases.
sentences.chinese: 布匹在装入木箱以前要用牛皮纸包好。

sentences.english: With a sigh, I slid the manuscript into the manila envelope and sealed it.
sentences.chinese: 我叹了口气，把手稿塞进牛皮纸信封，封上口。

sentences.english: He was pasting up the holes in the glass with brown paper.
sentences.chinese: 他用牛皮纸把玻璃窗上的洞糊上了。

sentences.english: Then there's brown paper, which looks stunning tied up with ribbon (recycled from an old present or bouquet of flowers preferably) or raffia.
sentences.chinese: 接下来就是包上牛皮纸，用丝带绑上上开起来棒极了。

sentences.english: Roll your dough on parchment paper, add toppings and lift it all onto the tile.
sentences.chinese: 在牛皮纸上搓揉生面并加上配料。

sentences.english: The piece goods are to be wrapped in kraft IT, then packed in wooden cases.
sentences.chinese: 布疋在装进木箱已往要用牛皮纸包好。

sentences.english: Two were written on fine vellum and made out by name.
sentences.chinese: 其中的两张写在上好的牛皮纸上列出了受益人名字。

sentences.english: First we need the manilla cardboard for the spine of the cover.
sentences.chinese: 首先我们要用到档案袋的牛皮纸来做书脊部分的封面。

definition: fine paper made from bamboo, used for calligraphy, painting etc/also written 毛邊|毛边[mao2 bian1]
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
